pages.text: You come to activate this tablet for, we believe, supreme food a mere crafter can only dream of. Right? Then, get some from $(o)a dream$().$(p)Yes, the best food exists in dreams! While asleep, living thing tends to see what they yearn forâ€• purified, deformed and idealized in the sea of abstraction.

Sounds pretty unrealistic, isn't it? Well, correct. After all, dreamt things are just dreams, not real. There's no way you can eat such things in reality.$(p)Except there is. A mystical instrument, $(o)dream pot$(), will do the job for you.
Simmering in the dead of night
